IV.i.2.E.1.d
.
Locally Devised Checklists
Regional offices (ROs) are not authorized to create local checklists for A&A and/or housebound examinations.
Checklists created and submitted by individual treatment providers should be evaluated as any other item of evidence.  However,
Yes
or
No
blocks do not provide sufficient descriptive information to assess the extent of a claimant’s incapacitation.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Examinations in Special Situations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
